data.lyric:
[ti:Raised on Country]
[ar:Chris Young]
[al:Raised on Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Raised on Country - Chris Young
[00:04.04]Lyrics by：Chris Young/Cary Barlowe/Corey Crowder
[00:08.08]Composed by：Chris Young/Cary Barlowe/Corey Crowder
[00:12.12]Git a little southern drawl in my talk
[00:15.90]Little pickup truck on my highway
[00:18.66]Got a little boot stomp in my walk
[00:22.27]Little neon lighting my Friday
[00:25.57]Got some Tennessee in my whiskey
[00:28.77]Raise a cup up if you with me
[00:31.98]I was raised on Merle raised on Willie
[00:35.25]Got my Honky Tonk attitude from Joe Diffie
[00:38.86]Daddy did too it's family tradition
[00:42.03]If someone cranks it up you can't help but listen
[00:45.39]My upbringing sounds like George Strait singing
[00:51.13]And I gotta give props to the radio
[00:54.54]'Cause if you know me I was raised on country
[01:04.16]It's the only reason that I survived
[01:07.68]Every breakup and every party
[01:10.94]It's the soundtrack to my life
[01:14.36]It runs deep in my DNA
[01:17.28]I was raised on Merle raised on Willie
[01:20.71]Got my Honky Tonk attitude from Joe Diffie
[01:24.25]Daddy did too it's family tradition
[01:27.45]If someone cranks it up you can't help but listen
[01:30.81]My upbringing sounds like George Strait singing
[01:36.54]And I gotta give props to the radio
[01:39.97]'Cause if you know me I was raised on country
[01:48.29]I was raised on country
[01:57.02]Raised on country
[01:59.63]Learned a lot about living and a little 'bout love
[02:03.20]Raised on country
[02:05.98]And you know that's something I'm so proud of
[02:09.32]I was raised on Merle raised on Willie
[02:12.53]Got my Honky Tonk attitude from Joe Diffie
[02:16.17]Daddy did too it's family tradition
[02:19.29]If someone cranks it up you can't help but listen
[02:22.65]My upbringing sounds like George Strait singing
[02:28.34]And I gotta give props to the radio
[02:31.86]'Cause if you know me I was raised on country
[02:35.69]Raised on country music
[02:39.59]Yeah I was raised on country
[02:42.13]Raised on country music
[02:46.76]I was raised on country
[02:48.69]Raised on country music
data.trans:
[ti:Raised on Country]
[ar:Chris Young]
[al:Raised on Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.04]//
[00:08.08]//
[00:12.12]我说话带点南方口音
[00:15.90]在高速公路上开着皮卡
[00:18.66]走路时脚上穿着靴子
[00:22.27]周五夜晚的霓虹灯异常绚丽
[00:25.57]威士忌也带着一股田纳西风味
[00:28.77]如果你在我身边 请和我一起举杯
[00:31.98]我是由Merle和Willie抚养长大的
[00:35.25]我对酒吧音乐的看法深受Joe Diffie的影响
[00:38.86]我父亲也是 这是家族传统
[00:42.03]如果有人放了音乐 你也只能听着
[00:45.39]我的成长经历正如George Strait歌中所唱的那样
[00:51.13]我还得感谢有收音机
[00:54.54]如果你了解我 就知道我是在乡下长大的
[01:04.16]这是我能活下来的唯一原因
[01:07.68]每次聚散离合
[01:10.94]都是生活带给我的音乐灵感
[01:14.36]它埋藏在我的骨子里
[01:17.28]我是由Merle和Willie抚养长大的
[01:20.71]我对酒吧音乐的看法深受Joe Diffie的影响
[01:24.25]我父亲也是 这是家族传统
[01:27.45]如果有人放了音乐 你也只能听着
[01:30.81]我的成长经历正如George Strait歌中所唱的那样
[01:36.54]我还得感谢有收音机
[01:39.97]如果你了解我 就知道我是在乡下长大的
[01:48.29]我是在乡下长大的
[01:57.02]在乡下长大
[01:59.63]对生活的感悟颇深 对爱也略知一二
[02:03.20]在乡下长大
[02:05.98]你知道 这是我一直引以为傲的事情
[02:09.32]我是由Merle和Willie抚养长大的
[02:12.53]我对酒吧音乐的看法深受Joe Diffie的影响
[02:16.17]我父亲也是 这是家族传统
[02:19.29]如果有人放了音乐 你也只能听着
[02:22.65]我的成长经历正如George Strait歌中所唱的那样
[02:28.34]我还得感谢有收音机
[02:31.86]如果你了解我 就知道我是在乡下长大的
[02:35.69]听着乡村音乐长大
[02:39.59]我是在乡下长大的
[02:42.13]听着乡村音乐长大
[02:46.76]我是在乡下长大的
[02:48.69]听着乡村音乐长大
